property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each turn, whenever a creature attacks for the first time, you may draw a card. If you do, tap one of your opponent’s creatures. ■ 'Civil Count 3': If you have 3 or more light creatures and/or light tamaseeds, ignore effects that prevent your creatures that have "blocker" from attacking your opponent. Those creatures gets +6000 power and "powered breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your creatures gets "Escape". ■ When you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. ■ Each turn, when you put a card into your shield zone for the first time, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your Abyss creatures in your graveyard get "Abyss Rush". (You may summon a creature that has "Abyss Rush" from your graveyard. If you do, that creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn.) ■ When this creature would leave, you may discard 2 cards from your hand instead. ■ Your creatures in your graveyard cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your Abyss creatures in your graveyard get "Abyss Rush". (You may summon a creature that has "Abyss Rush" from your graveyard. If you do, that creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn.) ■ When this creature would leave, you may discard 2 cards from your hand instead. ■ Your creatures in your graveyard cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each turn, if you used a spell that costs 5 or more, or a tamaseed that costs 5 or more, you may put this creature from your hand. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) ■ 'Civil Count 3': Whenever this creature attacks, if you have a total of 3 or more water creatures and/or water tamaseeds, you may draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, you may draw a card for each of your light creatures and/or light tamaseeds. ■ Your light creatures and light tamaseeds cost 2 less to use. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ 'Civil Count 5': If you have a total of 5 or more light creatures and/or light tamaseeds, this creature gets +10000 power, "triple breaker" and "Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent shieldifies it.".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, tap up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. They don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more light creatures and/or light tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a creature that costs 5 or less from your hand. Then if you have more creatures than your opponent, your creatures can't be destroyed until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, tap up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. They don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more light creatures and/or light tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a creature that costs 5 or less from your hand. Then if you have more creatures than your opponent, your creatures can't be destroyed until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature taps, you may choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone that costs 4 or less and return it to its owner's hand. ■ 'Civil Count 3': If you have a total of 3 or more water creatures and/or water tamaseeds, this creature gets +6000 power, "double breaker", and can't be chosen by your opponent. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, discard 2 cards from your hand. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more water creatures and/or water tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of the following: ► You may use a tamaseed that costs 5 or less from your graveyard for no cost: ► You may cast a spell that costs 5 or less from your graveyard for no cost. If you do, after you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your creatures gets "Escape". ■ When you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. ■ Each turn, when you put a card into your shield zone for the first time, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, discard 3 cards from your opponent's hand at random. ■ Your Abyss can't leave due to your opponent's spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ During your turn, this tamaseed can't leave except by being destroyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, you may draw a card for each of your light creatures and/or light tamaseeds. ■ Your light creatures and light tamaseeds cost 2 less to use. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ 'Civil Count 5': If you have a total of 5 or more light creatures and/or light tamaseeds, this creature gets +10000 power, "triple breaker" and "Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent shieldifies it.".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, your opponent chooses one of their creatures that has the lowest power and destroys it. ■ 'Civil Count 3': When you put this creature, if you have a total of 3 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, your opponent chooses one of their creatures that has the highest power and destroys it. ■ When this creature attacks, destroy this creature after the attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 6 or more cards in your mana zone, you may pay Fire 3: to summon this creature. If you do, destroy this creature at the end of the turn, then draw a card. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ 'Civil Count 3': Whenever this creature attacks, if you have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards. For each card discarded this way, this creature gets +4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, discard 2 cards from your hand. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more water creatures and/or water tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of the following: ► You may use a tamaseed that costs 5 or less from your graveyard for no cost: ► You may cast a spell that costs 5 or less from your graveyard for no cost. If you do, after you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks or whenever one of your creatures is destroyed, choose one of the following: ▶ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker" and destroy it: ▶ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 3 or less and destroy it: ▶ Choose one of your opponent's tamaseeds that costs 3 or less and destroy it: ▶ Break one of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, each of your other creatures gets "power attacker +6000", "speed attacker" and "powered breaker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ During your turn, this tamaseed can't leave except by being destroyed.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 3 less to summon for each nature creature and/or nature tamaseed you put this turn. It can't cost 0 or less. {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ 'Civil Count 5': If you have a total of 5 or more nature creatures and/or nature tamaseeds, during your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature or tamaseed into the battle zone and that ability would trigger, that ability won't trigger instead. (For example, your opponent can't use an ability that starts with "When you put this creature".)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 6 or more cards in your mana zone, you may pay Fire 3: to summon this creature. If you do, draw 3 cards. For each card discarded this way, this creature gets +4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules

Then discard a card from your hand: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. property.value: ■ 'Civil Count 3': Whenever this creature attacks, if you have a total of 3 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, discard a card from your opponent's hand at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. ■ When you put this creature, return a card from your shield zone to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this tamaseed or another tamaseed that has "Coin of Bad Luck" in its name, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at your opponent's hand, choose a card and discard it. ■ 'Civil Count 2': If you have a total of 2 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 3 or more cards in your mana zone, you may pay Fire 1: to summon this creature. If you do, destroy this creature at the end of the turn, then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ 'Civil Count 3': If you have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, this creature gets "power attacker +6000" and "double breaker". (A creature that has "power attacker +6000" and "double breaker" gets +6000 power while attacking and breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this tamaseed or another tamaseed that has "Coin of Raging Fire" in its name, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This turn, the next creature you put gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ 'Civil Count 2': If you have 2 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, untap up to 3 cards in your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ 'Civil Count 3': Whenever this creature attacks, if you have a total of 3 or more nature creatures and/or nature tamaseeds, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This turn, the next creature you put gets "mach fighter" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "mach fighter" can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) ■ 'Civil Count 2': If you have a total of 2 or more nature creatures and/or nature tamaseeds, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this tamaseed or another tamaseed that has "Coin of Prosperity" in its name, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your Abyss creatures in your graveyard get "Abyss Rush". (You may summon a creature that has "Abyss Rush" from your graveyard. If you do, that creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn.) ■ When this creature would leave, you may discard 2 cards from your hand instead. ■ Your creatures in your graveyard cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, tap up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. They don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more light creatures and/or light tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a creature that costs 5 or less from your hand. Then if you have more creatures than your opponent, your creatures can't be destroyed until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your creatures gets "Escape". ■ When you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. ■ Each turn, when you put a card into your shield zone for the first time, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, you may draw a card for each of your light creatures and/or light tamaseeds. ■ Your light creatures and light tamaseeds cost 2 less to use. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ 'Civil Count 5': If you have a total of 5 or more light creatures and/or light tamaseeds, this creature gets +10000 power, "triple breaker" and "Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent shieldifies it.".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, discard 2 cards from your hand. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more water creatures and/or water tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of the following: ► You may use a tamaseed that costs 5 or less from your graveyard for no cost: ► You may cast a spell that costs 5 or less from your graveyard for no cost. If you do, after you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ During your turn, this tamaseed can't leave except by being destroyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 6 or more cards in your mana zone, you may pay Fire 3: to summon this creature. If you do, destroy this creature at the end of the turn, then draw a card. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ 'Civil Count 3': Whenever this creature attacks, if you have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards. For each card discarded this way, this creature gets +4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, each of your other creatures gets "power attacker +6000", "speed attacker" and "powered breaker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 3 less to summon for each nature creature and/or nature tamaseed you put this turn. It can't cost 0 or less. {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ 'Civil Count 5': If you have a total of 5 or more nature creatures and/or nature tamaseeds, during your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature or tamaseed into the battle zone and that ability would trigger, that ability won't trigger instead. (For example, your opponent can't use an ability that starts with "When you put this creature".)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, untap 4 cards in your mana zone. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more nature creatures and/or nature tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone, then put a creature or tamaseed from your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, discard a card from your hand and draw 2 cards. Then you may put a creature from your hand that costs 7 or less that can evolve from this creature on top of this creature. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, untap each time it wins a battle this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ZERO}: At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent put a creature into the battle zone for no cost, you may put this Creature from your hand into the battle zone for no cost. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Revolution 0: When you put this creature, if you have 0 shields, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have the highest power. For each creature destroyed in this way, your opponent chooses one of their shields and puts it into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Your opponent puts the top card of their deck into their graveyard. If that card's a creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. If that card's a spell, you may cast it for no cost and put it into its owner's graveyard. If it's not a creature or a spell, you may put a creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on one of your shields face up instead of your graveyard. (The stack is still considered one shield.) ■ Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if this card is in your shield zone face up, you may put a light creature that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone. Otherwise, draw a card.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature, use the next ability 3 times: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you show 2 cards that have the same cost. ■ If you reveal your entire deck in this way, take an extra turn after this one, and during the rest of this game, even if you don't have a card in your deck, you won't lose the game. ■ Add all face up cards to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Gogogo Gangan Galaxy: If you have 1 or less card in your hand, this creature costs 6 less to summon. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Multicolored creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {INVASION}-Multicolored Dragon (When one of your Multicolored Dragon attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all multicolored cards into your hand. Then put the rest into your graveyard. ■ Your multicolored Dragons cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 1 or less.
